name: Simud Scraper Highlights

on:
  workflow_dispatch:  # Permette di eseguire il workflow manualmente
  schedule:
    - cron: '0 */3 * * *'  # Esegue ogni 8 ore (es. 00:00, 08:00, 16:00 UTC)

jobs:
  scrape:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
      - name: Checkout repository with custom token
        uses: actions/checkout@v4  # Aggiornato alla versione più recente
        with:
          token: ${{ secrets.ACTIONS_TOKEN }}

      - name: Set up Python
        uses: actions/setup-python@v5  # Aggiornato alla versione più recente
        with:
          python-version: '3.9'

      - name: Install dependencies
        run: |
          pip install -U yt-dlp
          
      - name: Scarica coockies.txt
        run: |
          curl -L -o coockies.txt https://raw.githubusercontent.com/simud2/simud/refs/heads/main/coockies.txt

      - name: Run Simud Scraper Highlights
        env:
          GITHUB_WORKSPACE: ${{ github.workspace }}
        run: |
          python SimudLights.py

      - name: Commit and push updated M3U8 file
        run: |
          git config --global user.name "GitHub Action"
          git config --global user.email "action@github.com"
          git add Highlights/SimudLights.m3u8
          git commit -m "Aggiornato High con nuovi flussi" || echo "Nessun cambiamento da committare"
          git push
        continue-on-error: true
